Question: Hundreds of people descended on this person as he stepped from the bus; photographers then accompanied him into the base.
Hints: In April, this person began working for the Crown Electric company as a truck driver.
Entering a new school, Milam, for sixth grade in September 1946, this person was regarded as a loner.
Two weeks later, this person was booked on Louisiana Hayride, the Opry's chief, and more adventurous, rival.
